languages.text: Не доверяя полумерам, Лорд-капитан приказал{mf||а} взорвать отсек. Специалистам-подрывникам удалось провести операцию с ювелирной точностью, нанеся минимальный урон кораблю. Однако пикт-рекордер отправленного на разведку сервочерепа показала, что зеркало не повреждено и находится в полости на месте взорванного помещения.

traits.locale_text: Не доверяя полумерам, Лорд-капитан приказал{mf||а} взорвать отсек. Специалистам-подрывникам удалось провести операцию с ювелирной точностью, нанеся минимальный урон кораблю. Однако пикт-камера отправленного на разведку сервочерепа показала, что зеркало не повреждено и находится в полости на месте взорванного помещения.

languages.text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.
languages.original_text: Не доверяя полумерам, Лорд-капитан приказал{mf||а} взорвать отсек. Специалистам-подрывникам удалось провести операцию с ювелирной точностью, нанеся минимальный урон кораблю. Однако пикт-рекордер отправленного на разведку сервочерепа показала, что зеркало не повреждено и находится в полости на месте взорванного помещения.

traits.locale_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain ordered to blow up the compartment. The demolition specialists did everything by the book with minimal damage to the vessel. However, the pict camera in the servoskull sent to survey the situation shows that the mirror was not damaged and can still be found in a cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain ordered to blow up the compartment. The demolition specialists did everything by the book with minimal damage to the vessel. However, the pict camera in the servoskull sent to survey the situation shows that the mirror was not damaged and can still be found in a cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain ordered the detonation of the compartment. The demolition specialists did everything by the book with minimal damage to the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation shows that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and lies in the cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

languages.text: 舰长大人意识到，折衷的手段是不会起作用的，于是决定炸毁船舱。爆破小组准确无误地执行了这个命令，对船只的其他部分造成了尽可能小的损坏。然而，当伺服头骨被派去调查情况时，它的视讯记录仪显示镜子并没有受到丝毫损坏，此刻正平放在爆炸遗留下来的空洞之中。
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人意识到，折衷的手段是不会起作用的，于是决定炸毁船舱。爆破小组准确无误地执行了这个命令，对船只的其他部分造成了尽可能小的损坏。然而，当伺服头骨被派去调查情况时，它的视讯记录仪显示镜子并没有受到丝毫损坏，此刻正平放在爆炸遗留下来的空洞之中。

languages.text: Convencid{mf|o|a} de que las soluciones más sencillas no van a dar resultado, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ordenó detonar el compartimento entero. El equipo de demolición llevó a cabo la operación con precisión perfecta, causando tan solo daños mínimos al resto de la nave. Sin embargo, el grabaimágenes del servocráneo enviado a examinar la situación revela que el espejo está intacto y ahora yace en el hueco que ha dejado la explosión.
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: Convencid{mf|o|a} de que las soluciones más sencillas no van a dar resultado, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ordenó detonar el compartimento entero. El equipo de demolición llevó a cabo la operación con precisión perfecta, causando tan solo daños mínimos al resto de la nave. Sin embargo, el grabaimágenes del servocráneo enviado a examinar la situación revela que el espejo está intacto y ahora yace en el hueco que ha dejado la explosión.

languages.text: 中途半端な対策ではダメだと判断したロード・キャプテンは、区画室の爆破を命じた。解体班がピンポイントで処置を施した結果、船内の他の部分への被害は最小限にとどまった。しかしながら、この状況を調査するため派遣されたサーヴォスカルのピクト・レコーダーによると、鏡はまったく損傷しておらず、爆発によってできたくぼみに倒れているだけということがわかった。
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: 中途半端な対策ではダメだと判断したロード・キャプテンは、区画室の爆破を命じた。解体班がピンポイントで処置を施した結果、船内の他の部分への被害は最小限にとどまった。しかしながら、この状況を調査するため派遣されたサーヴォスカルのピクト・レコーダーによると、鏡はまったく損傷しておらず、爆発によってできたくぼみに倒れているだけということがわかった。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain beschließt, keine halben Sachen mehr zu machen, und erteilt den Befehl, das Modul zu sprengen. Das Sprengteam führt den Auftrag mit penibler Präzision aus, so dass der Rest des Schiffs nur minimale Schäden erleidet. Doch der Vid-Rekorder in dem Servoschädel, der zur Beurteilung der Lage losgeschickt wird, zeigt etwas Erstaunliches: Der Spiegel hat keinerlei Schaden davongetragen, er liegt einfach unversehrt in dem Krater der Explosion.
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain beschließt, keine halben Sachen mehr zu machen, und erteilt den Befehl, das Modul zu sprengen. Das Sprengteam führt den Auftrag mit penibler Präzision aus, so dass der Rest des Schiffs nur minimale Schäden erleidet. Doch der Vid-Rekorder in dem Servoschädel, der zur Beurteilung der Lage losgeschickt wird, zeigt etwas Erstaunliches: Der Spiegel hat keinerlei Schaden davongetragen, er liegt einfach unversehrt in dem Krater der Explosion.

languages.text: Estimant que ces demi-mesures sont insuffisantes, {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine donne l'ordre de faire exploser le compartiment. L'équipe de démolition mène sa mission avec une précision chirurgicale et préserve le reste du vaisseau autant que possible. Cependant, l'enregistreur vidéo du servocrâne envoyé pour évaluer la situation montre que le miroir n'a pas été endommagé le moins du monde et repose désormais dans la cavité créée par l'explosion.
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.

traits.locale_text: Estimant que ces demi-mesures sont insuffisantes, {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine donne l'ordre de faire exploser le compartiment. L'équipe de démolition mène sa mission avec une précision chirurgicale et préserve le reste du vaisseau autant que possible. Cependant, l'enregistreur vidéo du servocrâne envoyé pour évaluer la situation montre que le miroir n'a pas été endommagé le moins du monde et repose désormais dans la cavité créée par l'explosion.

languages.text: Alınan önlemlerin yeterli olmadığına karar veren Lord Kaptan, kompartımanın havaya uçurulmasını emrediyor. Tahribat ekibi, prosedürü düzgünce uygulayıp geminin kalanında minimum hasara sebep olacak şekilde tamamlıyor. Ancak durumu incelemek üzere gönderilen hizmeletin foto kaydedicisi, aynanın en ufak bir hasar görmediğini ve şu anda patlamayla oluşan çukurda bulunduğunu gösteriyor.
languages.original_text: Deciding that half-measures were not enough, the Lord Captain gave the order to blow up the compartment. The demolition team carried out the procedure with pinpoint precision, resulting in minimal damage to the rest of the vessel. However, the pict-recorder in the servo-skull sent to survey the situation showed that the mirror was not damaged in the slightest and it was now lying in the cavity left by the explosion.
